title: LAP: The Complexities of Memory, Truth, and Justice Processes: Artistic and Cultural Resistance
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews the issue editor, Roberta Villalon, on the subject of the September 2016 issue: "The Complexities of Memory, Truth, and Justice Processes: Artistic and Cultural Resistance."
content:encoded: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews the issue editor, Roberta Villalon, on the subject of the September 2016 issue: "The Complexities of Memory, Truth, and Justice Processes: Artistic and Cultural Resistance."
itunes:subtitle: Spanish Version
